website_summaries.verdict: This kit includes a full system of hair care products for giving your hair a lot of fullness.
pros: Includes conditioner with the shampoo as well as a thickening cream and dry shampoo for lifting your hair between washes
A great way to try out these products without spending too much money
cons: When it says "mini" – it really is
Do not expect a lot of product

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Once again, I ordered "travel size" on this product...had heard positive words re its working great on fine, thin hair...and I love it! I've been all over trying to find a product that "at least helps", and I honestly believe I have found it! Requires very small amount to do the job too...I am an extremely happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to try out the Living Proof product line and I’m so glad I did. Love them all. I recently purchased a full size thickening cream & the mousse. I highly recommend this line for fine thin hair. Also I was surprised at how little it takes to get a beautiful result. I recommend starting with a smaller amount than you think you’ll need!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Godwin

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 4
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sampler kit to try for my thin hair, only the dry shampoo I would consider buying again. The shampoo and conditioner didn’t add thickness or volume, left my hair feeling dry and lifeless, felt like any cheap brand. The thickening lotion was so heavy that it weighed the hair down and my hair wouldn’t hold the curl from curling iron. The only thing I would try again is the dry shampoo, however there are other dry shampoo brands that are so much better. So, I would not recommend these products or buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rate it Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best volume product EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best product to give fine,lifeless, straight hair volume and bounce. Makes my hair look smooth and full. ❤❤❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: P❤J

customer_reviews.title: it’s okay
customer_reviews.text: it’s a great product! i think i’ll continue buying the small packets than the full shampoo because i’m not 100% sold on it yet, but it does make my hair VERY soft. easy to comb after wash too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for fine hair or anyone that actually wants to see results
customer_reviews.text: Overpowering perfume scent for shampoo/conditioner. Felt like I was washing my hair with hairspray. Thickening cream was below average. Worst of all products in package was volume spray. Made my hair weighted down and oily feeling. I have fine hair and would NOT recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelb

customer_reviews.title: Best products ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, frizzy hair and have difficulties finding products that I am happy with. The products from Living Proof are amazing and I really, really recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Modesty Blaise

customer_reviews.title: Good hair products
customer_reviews.text: Great product package. I thick I’ll. continue with shampoo only. This line is great but costly for me. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dian Burris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the samples to see it would be worth ordering the regular size products. I really do think they made a difference in my hair. Love the scent! Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: WildcatFan

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is a rip off at 18 dollars. Not worth the cost. You have certainly scaled back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Product
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money !! There was barley enough product for one wash in the pouch.. Can't even give an honest opinion because there wasn't enough product to use.. this thing is so small and way too expensive for what you actually get ...
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Add fullness without sticky hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Definitely adds fullness!! I marked 3 stars for moisture because you wouldn’t want moisture in this...i have thick, fine hair that lays flat without this product!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

product_meta.title: Living proof Fullness + Volume Mini Transformation Kit
product_meta.description:
1oz Full Shampoo, 1oz Full Conditioner, .33oz Full Thickening Cream, 3oz Full Dry Volume Blast.

THE STORY OF LIVING PROOF
We solve the toughest beauty challenges with science and patented technology originating from MIT.
